name: Honey-Glazed Ceviche
desc: Ororon's specialty. "This is to honor my elders." And without further ado, the fish slices were served up, glistening with juicy deliciousness. From the sweet, delicate flavor, you can tell that the sauce most likely contains honey of the highest caliber, the gathering of which must have required a great deal of thought and effort. It's not often that you get to witness such displays of filial respect.

customize.name: Recipe: Sour Sauce Ceviche
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sour Sauce Ceviche.

customize.name: Sour Sauce Ceviche
customize.desc: Raw pieces of fish with a fruity fragrance. The fish — which must be fresh — is first skinned and cut into thick chunks, then marinated in the sour sauce until the fish turns white, after which shredded vegetables are added for seasoning. A combination of sour and spicy flavors, it is one of Natlan's most classic flavors.

customize.name: Ororon
customize.desc: A young man from the Masters of the Night-Wind who instead lives in the wild alongside all manner of life.

customize.name: Honey-Glazed Ceviche
customize.desc: Ororon's specialty. "This is to honor my elders." And without further ado, the fish slices were served up, glistening with juicy deliciousness. From the sweet, delicate flavor, you can tell that the sauce most likely contains honey of the highest caliber, the gathering of which must have required a great deal of thought and effort. It's not often that you get to witness such displays of filial respect.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 114 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
